alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 26 at 9:54PM PST until January 29 at 4:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 55 to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of the San Diego County Valleys and San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
